feat.benefit: When you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, each ally within 5 squares of you that can see you gains a bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. The bonus equals one-half your Charisma modifier.

feat.title: High Elf Kin
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Arcana checks.
When you use your elven accuracy racial power, you can use a free reaction to teleport 2 squares.

feat.title: Highborn Drow
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Arcana checks.
Also, you gain the webs of darkness Lolthtouched power.

power.title: Webs of Darkness
power.fluff: Inky tendrils of solidified darkness leap from your fingertip and bind your enemies

section.name: Lolthtouched:
section.text: You can only use one Lolthtouched power per encounter.

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Ability +4 vs. Reflex

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Ability +6

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is covered in dark webs until the end of your next turn.
While covered, the target is slowed and all creatures have concealment against the target.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When you gain this power, choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You use the chosen ability for the attack roll.

feat.title: Hindering Shield
feat.benefit: Whenever you pull, push, or slide an adjacent creature with an attack while you are using a shield, you can also slow that creature until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Holy Savagery
feat.benefit: When you use a Channel Divinity power while you are bloodied, you gain a +1 bonus to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If the Channel Divinity power you use has melee attack rolls, you gain the bonus on that power as well.

feat.title: Holy Steed
feat.benefit: While you are mounted, your mount gains a +2 bonus to all defenses, and a bonus to damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Honored Foe
feat.benefit: When a creature under your Divine Sanction damage you, you gain temporary hit points after the damage has been resolved. The temporary hit points equal your Wisdom modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 4 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Horns of the Shadow Reaper
feat.benefit: When you use your goring charge racial power and the target has your shrouds on it, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack roll, and you can shift half your speed as the last part of resolving the power.

feat.title: Human Nature Lore
feat.benefit: When you make an Endurance check or a Nature check, you can roll twice and use either result.

feat.title: Hunter in Darkness
feat.benefit: When you use your cloud of darkness racial power, each enemy within the cloud counts as being designated your quarry while it remains in the cloud.
This does not count against the normal limit of one quarry, and any other creature designated as your quarry remains so.
You can deal your Hunter's Quarry damage once per round against each quarry in the cloud.

feat.title: Hunter's Advantage
feat.benefit: Your Hunter's Quarry additional damage increases by 2 when you have combat advantage against your quarry.
The damage increases by 4 starting at 21st level.

feat.title: Hunter's Resurgence
feat.benefit: When you reduce your quarry to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use your second wind as a free reaction. You do not gain the normal bonus to defenses if you do so.

feat.title: Hunting Wolf Form
feat.benefit: While you are in beast form, you gain a +1 feat bonus to speed.
Also, while you are in beast form, you gain a +5 feat bonus to Perception checks, and when you roll a 1 on a Perception check, you can reroll the check until you get a result other than 1.

feat.title: Icy Heart
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to Cold damage rolls.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.
Also, whenever you take cold damage from an attack, each enemy within 2 squares of you becomes slowed until the start of the currently acting creature's next turn.

feat.title: Immortal Resilience
feat.benefit: When using your memories of a thousand lifetimes racial power to modify a saving throw, you treat a result that is lower than the average for the die you roll (3 for d6, or 4 for d8) as the average.

feat.title: Immutability
feat.benefit: When you use your warforged resolve racial power, you can make a saving throw against any effect that a save can end instead of only against an effect that deals ongoing damage.
Also, you gain a +2 bonus to the saving throw granted by your warforged resolve racial power.

feat.title: Impaling Spear
feat.benefit: When you use a Spear to make a melee basic attack, you can choose to make the attack against Reflex instead of AC.

feat.title: Impetious Charger
feat.benefit: When you charge an enemy, the first ally that makes an enemy gainst that enemy before the end of your next turn gains combat advantage on his or her attack.
If your charge attack hits, all your allies gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn instead.

feat.title: Implacable Mettle
feat.benefit: If the target of your divine mettle Channel Divinity power fails the granted saving throw, you gain an additional use of Channel Divinity this encounter, and the target gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn. You do not regain the use of divine mettle.
Starting at 21st level, you also regain the use of your divine mettle Channel Divinity power when the target fails the saving throw.

feat.title: Implacable Outrage
feat.benefit: When you use your ardent outrage class power, you also push the target 1 square.

feat.title: Implement Master
feat.benefit: You gain the Wizard class feature Arcane Implement Mastery.

feat.title: Improved Ardent Surge
feat.benefit: The target of your ardent surge class power regains additional hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Improved Battlefront Shift
feat.benefit: Your battlefront shift class power can target one additional ally.

feat.title: Improved Cunning
feat.benefit: When you use your Virtue of Cunning class feature to slide an ally, you can slide that ally 1 additional square.

feat.title: Improved Fey Step
feat.benefit: The maximum distance you can teleport with your fey step racial power increases by 2 squares.

feat.title: Improved Legacy
feat.benefit: The extra damage dealt by your elemental legacy bloodline power increases by 4.
Starting at 21st level, the extra damage increases by 6 instead.

feat.title: Improved Orb of Deception
feat.benefit: When you hit a creature with an arcane Illusion power while wielding an orb, that creature grants combat advantage to the first ally who attacks it before the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Improved Orb of Imposition
feat.benefit: Each time a creature fails a saving throw against the target effect of your orb of imposition class power, it takes damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
This damage increases to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Improved Staff of Defence
feat.benefit: While you wield a staff, you gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.

feat.title: Improved Steed (Behemoth)
feat.benefit: When you use your call celestial steed class power, you can choose to summon a celestial behemoth instead of a celestial warhorse.

feat.title: Improved Steed (Pegasus)
feat.benefit: When you use your call celestial steed class power, you can choose to summon a celestial pegasus instead of a celestial warhorse.

feat.title: Improved Tome of Binding
feat.benefit: When you use an arcane Summoning power while wielding a tome, the creatures you summon appear with 10 temporary hit points.
These temporary hit points increase to 15 at 21st level.

feat.title: Improved Tome of Readiness
feat.benefit: When you prepare your Wizard powers from your spellbook, choose one daily attack power or one utility power of your level or lower as your improved tome spell.
Also, you gain the improved tome of readiness power.

power.title: Improved Tome of Readiness
power.fluff: You page through your tome to find a spell more appropriate to the current situation

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a tome implement.

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must have at least one unexpended wizard daily attack of your improved tome spell's level or higher.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You expend one wizard daily attack of your improved tome spell's level or higher, and gain the use of your improved tome spell.
If you have not used your improved tome spell before the end of the encounter, it is automatically expended and you regain the power you expended to gain use of it as part of your next short rest.

feat.title: Improved Valor
feat.benefit: The numer of temporary hit points granted by your Virtue of Valor class feature increase by 4.
This increas becomes 8 at 21st level.

feat.title: Improved Vigor
feat.benefit: Your number of healing surges increases by one.
Also, the number temporary hit points you gain from Fighter powers increases by 3.
This increase becomes 6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Improved Wand of Accuracy
feat.benefit: While you wield a wand, your arcane powers ignore enemies' cover and superior cover.

feat.title: Inescapable Force
feat.benefit: When you use a Force power against an insubstantial creature, you deal full damage to it.
If the insubstantial creature normally takes full damage from force damage, you deal an additiona +1d10 force damage to it instead.
This additional damage increases to +2d10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Inevitable Volley
feat.benefit: When you use your inevitable shot class power, you can make two attacks instead of one, but both must be against a different target.

feat.title: Inexorable Pursuit
feat.benefit: When you charge your oath target, you can ignore difficult terrain and move through spaces occupied by enemies during the movement as part of the charge. You still trigger opportunity attacks normally.

feat.title: Infernal Captain's Fury
feat.benefit: When you hit a creature under your captain's curse with an attack, you can choose for the chosen ally's attack to deal +2d6 extra fire damage instead of gaining combat advantage.
The fire damage increases to +3d6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Infernal Sneak Attack
feat.benefit: When you deal your Sneak Attack damage, you can choose to expend your infernal wrath racial power as a free interrupt.
If you do, you apply the effects of your infernal wrath racial power as part of the sneak attack, and all of the sneak attack damage is fire damage.

feat.title: Insightful Preparation
feat.benefit: Any ally who can see and hear you gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls against enemies that have not yet acted during the encounter.

feat.title: Inspiring Oath
feat.benefit: When you use your oath of enmity class power, one ally that can see you can shift 2 squares towards the target of your oath as a free reaction.

feat.title: Instinctive Advance
feat.benefit: When you use your ardent eruption class power, the target can also shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Invigorating Critical
feat.benefit: The first in an encounter that you score a critical hit with a divine attack power, an ally adjacent to either you or the target regains hit points equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
This hit points regained increase to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Invoker Defense
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy within 3 squares of you with an invoker power, you gain a +2 feat bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Invoker's Blaze
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to damage rolls with divine attack powers that have the Fire or Radiant keyword. While you are bloodied, this bonus increases to +5.
These bonuses increase to +4 and +7 at 21st level.

feat.title: Invoker's Control
feat.benefit: When an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect caused by one of your divine attack powers, you gain a +2 bonus to the first attack roll you make against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Iron Hands
feat.benefit: While you have the bonus from your iron mind racial power, you also gain a bonus to melee damage rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Irrefutable Blade
feat.benefit: When you miss with a Rogue encounter attack while wielding a rapier, you deal damage equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier + your rapier's enhancement bonus.

feat.title: Jump Through Darkness
feat.benefit: On the same turn that you use your cloud of darkness racial power, you can use a free action to teleport to any unoccupied space within the cloud.
If you have the Darkness Reign feat, you can use the free action to teleport each time you sustain the power as well.
If you have the Instinctive Darkness feat, you can instead use a free reaction to teleport after the attack triggering that feat has been resolved.

feat.title: Just Punishment
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy reduces an ally you can see to 0 hit points or fewer, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy. This bonus lasts until the end of the encounter, or until that ally has 1 or more hit points, whichever comes first.

feat.title: Justice Hammer
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a divine at-will attack, the target is dazed until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Keep Your Feet
feat.benefit: When you are knocked prone, you can use an immediate reaction to stand up.

feat.title: Killer in the Crowd
feat.benefit: Enemies do not grant cover to your targets.
Also, you gain cover from your enemies.

feat.title: King's Wrath
feat.benefit: Whenever a nonminion creature cursed by you drops to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use the following action instead of your fell might recovery class power:
Free Reaction (Arcane): Choose one creature within 5 squares of the triggering creature. That creature takes psychic damage equal to your Charisma modifier.
The damage increases to 5 + your Charisma modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Lashing Flail
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit with a melee basic attack using a Flail you have proficiency with, you can slide the target 1 square.

feat.title: Lasting Frost
feat.benefit: Once per turn, the first target you hit with a Cold power gains vulnerable 5 cold after the attack has been resolved. The vulnerable lasts until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 21st level, once per turn, each target you hit with a Cold power gains the vulnerable.

feat.title: Legacy of War
feat.benefit: You add your Constitution modifier to the resistance provided by your stone's endurance racial power.

feat.title: Liberating Shard Sward
feat.benefit: When you use your shard swarm racial power, you can also make a saving throw against one effect on you, even if that effect normally doesn't end of a save.

feat.title: Liberating Teleport
feat.benefit: If you teleport during your own turn, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws you make at the end of that turn.

feat.title: Lifespirit Healing
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, a second ally within 5 squares of you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing value and to make a saving throw.
If you have the Lifespirit Recovery feat, the second ally can make the saving throw against an effect that normally doesn't end on a save.

feat.title: Light Blade Precision
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to Weapon damage rolls with Light Blades against Large or larger targets.
This bonus increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Light of Conviction
feat.benefit: As a minor action, you can shed bright light out to 4 squares, and dim light out to 4 squares further. The light ends 24 hours after you die, or if you end it as a free action on your turn.
Also, you gain the punitive radiance attack power. This power counts as a power of your divine class.

power.title: Punitive Radiance
power.fluff: The punishment you levy on the unrighteous is visible from miles away

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a divine attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes an extra +1d6 radiant damage from the triggering attack, and is surrounded by radiance until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: An extra +2d6 radiant damage.
While surrounded by radiance, the target grants combat advantage and cannot benefit from invisibility, concealment, or total concealment.

feat.title: Lightning Arc
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit with a power that has the Lightning keyword, you can choose to treat the attack as a normal hit instead.

If you do, choose another target within 10 squares of the original target. The new target cannot already be a target of the triggering power, or otherwise affected by it. You deal damage to the new target equal to the damage you deal the original target. The new target only takes the damage, it is not otherwise affected by the power.

feat.title: Lightning Soul
feat.benefit: You gain a +3 feat bonus to Lightning damage rolls.
This bonus increases to +4 at 21st level.
Also, whenever you take lightning damage, one enemy within 5 squares of you takes 10 lightning damage.
This damage increases to 15 lightning damage at 21st level.

feat.title: Lightning Transport
feat.benefit: When you reduce at least one creature to 0 hit points or fewer with a wizard Lightning power, you can teleport as a free reaction. The number of squares you can teleport equals your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Linebreaker
feat.benefit: When you use your speed of thought class power, you can enter an enemy's space. Doing so ends the movement, and you must then slide the enemy 1 square so that you are no longer in its space.

feat.title: Luck of the Gods
feat.benefit: The first time in an encounter that you roll a natural 20 on an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw, remove all effects on you that a save can end.

feat.title: Lucky Retribution
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy misses you with an attack, you gain combat advantage with your invoker attack powers against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Lyric of Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: Each ally affected by your Song or Rest class feature regains 2 additional hit points for each healing surge he or she spends at the end of the rest.
These additional hit points regained increase to 3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Majestic Rescue
feat.benefit: When you use your majestic word class power, the target can also make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

feat.title: Mammon's Theft of Health
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you can choose an ally within 5 squares of you.
If you do, the chosen ally loses one healing surge, and you regain additional hit points equal to your healing surge value.

feat.title: Maneuvering Attack
feat.benefit: When you pull, push, or slide a target with a primal Weapon attack using either a Polearm or Spear that you have proficiency with, that target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Mantle of Caution
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, allies within the radius of your Ardent Mantle gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.

feat.title: Mark of the Evil Eye
feat.benefit: Whenever you use your enforce challenge class power, you can use your evil eye of the Vistani bloodline power, if it is available, against the same target before making the attack. If you do, using the power does not trigger opportunity attacks.

feat.title: Marked Jaunt
feat.benefit: If an enemy you have marked makes an attack that doesn't include you as a target, you can combine your shadow jaunt racial power and your enforce challenge class power.
If you do, you must use your shadow jaunt to teleport within reach of the triggering enemy and then resolve enforce challenge.

feat.title: Marked Scourge
feat.benefit: On each of your turns, the first time you roll damage against an enemy marked by you, you deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Martial Accuracy
feat.benefit: When you use your elven accuracy racial power to reroll the attack roll of a martial attack, you can roll twice and use either result.

feat.title: Master of Fire and Darkness
feat.benefit: You can use both your cloud of darkness and your darkfire Lolthtouched powers once per encounter instead of only one of them.
feat.special: If you have the Highborn Drow feat, you can replace the use of one of these with your webs of darkness racial power, deciding when you use that power.
Starting at 21st level, you can use all three powers once per encounter instead.

feat.title: Master's Instruction
feat.benefit: When you use a monk encounter attack power and miss at least one target, choose one ally you can see and one target you missed.
The chosen ally gains a +2 bonus to his or her first attack roll against the chosen target before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Mastered Technique
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to AC when you hit with a melee basic attack or a fighter at-will attack on your turn. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Memory of Strikes Past
feat.benefit: You gain the honed through memory power. This power counts as a power of your martial class.

power.title: Honed Through Memory
power.fluff: When you miss an enemy with an attack, you commit your error to memory and call upon it to strike true

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You miss a creature with a melee or ranged attack roll

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +3 power bonus martial attack rolls against the triggering creature until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Merciful Power
feat.benefit: Each target of your healer's mercy class power can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end.

feat.title: Merciful Shift
feat.benefit: Each target of your healer's mercy class power can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Merciless Killer
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage on an attack against a bloodied creature, you gain a +5 bonus to the damage roll against that creature.

feat.title: Message of Doom Spurned
feat.benefit: When you have a bonus available from your fate of the void Pact Boon power, you can use an immediate interrupt when an enemy hits you.
If you do, you apply the bonus to all your defenses against the triggering attack. The bonus is lost after the triggering attack has been resolved.

feat.title: Mettle
feat.benefit: When an area or close attack targeting your Fortitude defense or Will defense misses you but deals damage on a miss, you take no damage from the attack. You still suffer any other effects the attack might have.

feat.title: Mettle Proven
feat.benefit: When an ally succeeds on the saving throw granted by your divine mettle Channel Divinity power, that ally can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.
Your divine mettle does not gain the Healing keyword.

feat.title: Mighty Battlerage
feat.benefit: The bonus to damage you gain from your Battlerager Training increases by +1.
This increase becomes +2 starting at 21st level.

feat.title: Minion of the Dark
feat.benefit: You gain darkvision.

feat.title: Mist Form Rescue
feat.benefit: You can use your mist form bloodline power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger:
Trigger: An attack critically hits you or reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer; the triggering attack cannot deal radiant damage to you

When you use the power with this trigger, the triggering attack cannot reduce you below 1 hit point, and you can shift 2 squares after the triggering attack has been resolved, but you cannot sustain the power.

feat.title: Moonbow Prelate
feat.benefit: When you use a shortbow as an implement for a ranged divine power, area divine power, ranged arcane power, or area arcane power, you can extend the power's range by 5 squares.

feat.title: Nightmare Master
feat.benefit: When you hit a creature with a Fear power, that creature is dazed by that power until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Onslaught of Enmity
feat.benefit: When you use your oath of enmity class power, you can shift 2 squares closer to the target as a free reaction.

feat.title: Opportune Chaos Burst
feat.benefit: When you make your first attack roll each turn, choose odd numbers or even numbers.

If you chose odd and the result on the die is an odd number, your Chaos Burst class feature allows you to roll two saving throws against effects on you that a save can end instead of one. You can roll twice against the same effect, or roll once against two different effects.
If you chose even and the result on the die is an even number, your Chaos Burst class feature grants you a +3 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn instead of a +1 bonus.

feat.title: Opportunistic Movement
feat.benefit: While you are adjacent to an enemy granting combat advantage to you, your movement doesn't trigger attacks from that creature.

feat.title: Opportunistic Sneak Attacker
feat.benefit: When you hit with an opportunity attack and deal Sneak Attack damage, the target is also slowed until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Opportunity Breath
feat.benefit: When you make an opportunity attack, you can use your dragon breath racial power instead of making a melee basic attack. If you do, you must include the triggering enemy as a target.

feat.title: Opportunity Sidestep
feat.benefit: When you hit with an opportunity attack, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Overbearing Retribution
feat.benefit: When you use your armor of wrath Channel Divinity power, you knock the target prone at the end of the push.

feat.title: Overwhelming Critical
feat.benefit: When you score a critical hit, you can also knock the target prone.

feat.title: Pain Doesn't Hurt
feat.benefit: While you are bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage.
Also, the first time during an encounter that you become bloodied, you ignore ongoing damage until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Painful Oath
feat.benefit: The first time on each of your turns that you hit your oath target, you deal extra radiant and necrotic damage. The damage equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Paragon Defenses
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.

feat.title: Perfect Fracture
feat.benefit: You can use your shard swarm racial power as an immediate reaction when you become bloodied.

feat.title: Persistent Challenge
feat.benefit: Once per encounter, if you didn't engage the target of your divine challenge class power, you can choose for the Divine Sanction to continue as if you did engage the target.

feat.title: Persistent Poison
feat.benefit: Your targets take a -2 penalty to saving throws made against your Poison effects.

feat.title: Persistent Threat
feat.benefit: While you are dazed, you can still flank enemies, and you can take a single opportunity action if you haven't taken one since the start of your previous turn.

feat.title: Pervasive Light
feat.benefit: When you hit a target that has vulnerable radiant with a divine attack that does not deal radiant damage, you still trigger that vulnerability.

feat.title: Pervasive Thoughts
feat.benefit: Whenever a creature fails a saving throw against an effect caused by one of your Psion attack power, it gains vulnerable 3 psychic until the end of its next turn.
This vulnerability increases to 6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Phalanx Warrior
feat.benefit: When you are using a shield and able to take actions, allies adjacent to you gain a +1 shield bonus to AC.
If you have the Shield Specialization feat, adjacent allies also gain a +1 shield bonus to Reflex.

feat.title: Phantasmal Destruction
feat.benefit: When you have combat advantage against a creature, any arcane Illusion power that you use against that creature can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

feat.title: Piercing Pick
feat.benefit: Whenever you use a Pick to make a melee Weapon attack, you can target AC or Fortitude.

feat.title: Pillar of Heaven
feat.benefit: When you miss each target with an Invoker encounter attack power while using a Staff, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Pinning Challenge
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit a target that is already marked by you with a basic attack using a two-handed weapon, the target is also immobilized until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Pledge of Retribution
feat.benefit: If you miss your oath target with an attack, you gain a +2 bonus to the next attack roll you make against it.

If you do not make an attack against your oath target before the end of your next turn, the bonus is lost. If you miss with your next attack roll, increase the bonus by +1 each time you miss and the bonus remains until the end of your following turn.

feat.title: Plunging Blade
feat.benefit: When you make an opportunity attack using a Light Blade you have proficiency with, you can score a critical hit on a natural roll of 19 or 20.
If you have the Light Blade Mastery feat, this increases to a natural roll of 18, 19 or 20.

feat.title: Point-blank Shot
feat.benefit: If you make ranged attack against a foe within 5 squares of you, your attack ignores cover and concealment, and treats superior cover as cover.

feat.title: Poisonous Beast
feat.benefit: Whenever your beast companion hits a creature with a melee basic attack, that creature takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).
This ongoing damage increases to 10 at 21st level.

feat.title: Polearm Gamble
feat.benefit: When a nonadjacent enemy enters a square adjacent to you, you can make an opportunity attack against that enemy with a polearm you are wielding and have proficiency with. If you do, you grant combat advantage to that enemy until the end of the enemy's current turn.

feat.title: Pouncing Form
feat.benefit: When you use your wild shape class power to change from your humanoid form to beast form, you can shift a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your Dexterity modifier.
You do not gain the benefits of the Agile Form feat, even if you have it.

feat.title: Power Strike Specialization
feat.benefit: Choose one of following specialization benefits:

Bladed Step: After you use your power strike class power with a Light Blade or a one-handed Heavy Blade, you can shift 1 square after the triggering attack has been resolved. You also gain combat advantage against the target of the triggering attack until the end of your next turn.
Bludgeoning Staff: When you use your power strike class power with a Staff, you can push the target up to 2 squares and shift 2 squares as part of resolving the hit.
Brutal Axe: When you use your power strike class power with an Axe, you can knock the target of the triggering attack prone.

Driving Blade: When you use your power strike class power with a Heavy Blade, you can slide each enemy adjacent to you 1 square after the triggering attack has been resolved. If abilities such as feats or items allow you to increase the distance of forced movement, calculate the increase and halve it for this effect.

Hooking Bludgeon: When you use your power strike class power with a Hammer or Mace and the target of the triggering attack is adjacent to you, the target is also immobilized until the end of your next turn or until you are no longer adjacent to it. You also gain combat advantage against the target of the triggering attack until the end of your next turn.

Sweeping Polearm: When you use your power strike class power with a Polearm, all enemies adjacent to you other than the target of the triggering attack take damage equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier + your Polearm's enhancement bonus.
feat.special: You can choose this feat multiple times, and must choose a different specialization benefit each time. If your weapon qualifier for more than one specialization, you only gain the effect of one of your choice.

feat.title: Power Surge
feat.benefit: You can use a free action to expend a psion daily attack power to regain power points. The number of power points equals the highest augment cost for an at-will attack of the same level or lower.

feat.title: Powerful Lure
feat.benefit: When you use your lure of enchantment racial power, you can slide the target up to 6 squares, instead of the normal distance, and you can slide it into hindering terrain.

feat.title: Predatory Spirit
feat.benefit: When you use your longtooth shifting or razorclaw shifting racial power, you can reroll once attack roll made with a primal attack that misses before the end of your next turn. You can take either result.

feat.title: Predictive Defense
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit an enemy with an unaugmented psionic at-will attack, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against melee attacks until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Prescient Aid
feat.benefit: You can use the following action as an alternative to the action from your Virtue of Prescience:

Immediate Interrupt: Trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you misses with an attack roll; The triggering ally gains a power bonus to the triggering attack roll. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier.

feat.title: Prescient Dodge
feat.benefit: At the start of each encounter, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of your first turn (after any surprise round, if applicable).
Also, whenever you hit an enemy with an unaugmented psionic at-will attack power, you can spend 1 power point to gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Preserver's Fury
feat.benefit: When you use your preserver's rebuke Channel Divinity power and hit the triggering enemy with your first attack against it before the end of your next turn, the enemy gains vulnerable all until the end of your following turn. The vulnerable equals your Intelligence modifier.

feat.title: Preserver's Vengeance
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with divine attack powers while at least one bloodied ally is within 5 squares of you.

feat.title: Preternatural Senses
feat.benefit: Whenever you make a Perception check, you can roll twice and use the higher result.

feat.title: Primal Eye
feat.benefit: You add either your Dexterity modifier or your Strength modifier to damage rolls with ranged basic attacks.

feat.title: Primal Fury
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied enemies.

feat.title: Prime Curse
feat.benefit: The bonus to attack rolls granted by your Prime Shot class feature or your Prime Strike class feature increases to +2 if the target is also under your curse.

feat.title: Prime Punisher
feat.benefit: When you gain the benefit of your Prime Shot class feature or your Prime Strike class feature, you also deal +2 additional damage.
The additional damage increases to +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Prime Quarry
feat.benefit: The bonus to attack rolls granted by your Prime Shot class feature or your Prime Strike class feature increases to +2 if the target is also your quarry.

feat.title: Prisoner's Resolve
feat.benefit: If you fail a saving throw, you can take damage equal to the level of the effect's source, usually a creature's level. If you do, you can reroll that saving throw.
You can only do this once per effect each round. The damage you take cannot be reduced in any way.

feat.title: Prophetic Preparation
feat.benefit: Once per day, as a free action, you can swap one wizard daily attack spell you didn't prepare in place of one you did prepare of the same level or higher.
Also once per day, as a free action, you can swap one wizard utility spell you didn't prepare in place of one you did prepare of the same level or higher.
You choose the new power when you use the action.

feat.title: Protected Isolation
feat.benefit: While you are adjacent to your oath target, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

feat.title: Protective Beast
feat.benefit: Whenever your beast companion is adjacent to you, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

feat.title: Protector's Hex
feat.benefit: When you hit an enemy under your curse with an attack, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to close and melee attacks against your allies until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Psion Staff Focus
feat.benefit: When you use a ranged psion power using a staff against a target adjacent to you, it does not provoke an opportunity attack from that target.

feat.title: Psionic Defiling
feat.benefit: You gain the arcane defiling power and can use it with psionic daily attack powers. If you have other feats or abilities that affect your arcane defiling, those now affect your psionic powers in addition to arcane powers.

feat.title: Psionic Rejuvenation
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you also regain 1 power point.

feat.title: Psionic Rush
feat.benefit: When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can reduce the cost to augment any augmentable power you use during that action.

feat.title: Psychic Lock
feat.benefit: Any target you hit on your turn with a power that has the Psychic keyword takes a -2 penalty to the first attack roll it makes before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Psychic Wail
feat.benefit: When you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer on your turn with a power that has the Psychic keyword, choose one other enemy you can see within 5 squares of the first enemy. You gain combat advantage against the chosen enemy until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Punishing Axe
feat.benefit: Whenever you score a critical hit using an axe you have proficiency, you treat rolls of 1 or 2 on the critical damage dice and the extra dice from the High Crit property as rolls of 3.

feat.title: Punishing Rebuke
feat.benefit: Your spirits' rebuke class power deals an additional +1[W] damage.

feat.title: Puppeteer
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy fails a saving throw against an effect caused by one of your Psion attack powers, you can slide that enemy 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Quick Recovery
feat.benefit: You regain 5 additional hit points for each healing surge you spend at the end of a short rest.
Starting at 21ar level, this additional healing increases to 10 for each healing surge.

feat.title: Quick Wild Shape
feat.benefit: You can use your wild shape class power as a free action during your turn.

feat.title: Quori Backlash
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy dazes, dominates, or deals psychic damage to you, that enemy takes psychic damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.
This psychic damage increases to 10 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Radiant Hunter
feat.benefit: You can have your hunter's quarry damage count as radiant damage for the purposes of triggering vulnerable radiant and other weaknesses that creatures might have.

feat.title: Radiant Vessel
feat.benefit: If you hit an enemy with a cleric attack that has the Radiant keyword, the first time you use your healing word class power before the end of your next turn, the target regains an additional 1d6 hit points.
These additional hit points regained increase to 2d6 at 21st level.

feat.title: Rageblood Recovery
feat.benefit: When you hit with the charge attack granted by your swift charge class power, you can use a free reaction to spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

feat.title: Rampaging Beast
feat.benefit: Whenever your beast companion hits a creature with a melee basic attack, it can push that creature 1 square.

feat.title: Rapid Infusion
feat.benefit: You can use your Magical Infusion powers as a free action on your turn instead of as a minor action. You can still only use one per round.

feat.title: Raven Queen Devotee
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.
Also, you gain the following benefits with divine at-will attacks:

► When you target an undead creature and would make the target takes a penalty to attack rolls, you can choose to instead make the target grant combat advantage for the same duration. If the penalty is only for one attack roll, the target only grants combat advantage for the first attack roll against it.

► When you would grant an ally a bonus to AC, you can choose to instead grant that ally resist necrotic for the same duration. The resist equals one-half your level + one-half the higher of your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

feat.title: Raven Queen's Outrage
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit an undead creature with a divine encounter attack or a divine daily attack, you can also slide that creature 1 square as part of the hit. If the power already has forced movement, increase that forced movement by 1 square instead.

feat.title: Raven Queen's Scorn
feat.benefit: If your oath target is an undead creature, you can use a minor action once per turn to teleport to any space you can see and have line of effect to that is adjacent to the target. This action has the Divine and Teleportation keywords.

feat.title: Reactive Fey Step
feat.benefit: When you are pushed, pulled, or slid, or subject to any other forced movement, you can use your fey step racial power as an immediate interrupt. You negate the forced movement instead of teleporting.

feat.title: Reactive Jaunt
feat.benefit: You can use your shadow jaunt racial power as an immediate reaction with the following trigger:
Trigger: You take damage

feat.title: Reaper's Strike
feat.benefit: When you use your dark reaping racial power, you also gain a +2 bonus to the next attack roll you make.

feat.title: Reaping Burst
feat.benefit: When you use your dark reaping racial power, you can choose to gain the following effect instead of the power's normal effect:
Effect: The first burst or blast attack you make before the end of your next turn deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

feat.title: Reckless Attacker
feat.benefit: The first time on each of your turns that you score a critical hit, you can make a melee basic attack as a free reaction. If you make the attack, you take a -2 penalty to AC until the start of your next turn.

feat.title: Relentless Curse
feat.benefit: When an enemy under your urse is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use your warlock's curse as a free reaction.

feat.title: Reliable Action
feat.benefit: When an ally that can see and hear you and is in your warlord's aura spends an action point and makes an encounter attack as part of that action point, he or she regains that encounter attack at the start of his or her next turn if he or she missed all targets.

feat.title: Reliable Persistence
feat.benefit: When you miss a creature with a martial Reliable attack, you gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls against that creature with that power until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Reliable Resources
feat.benefit: When an ally who can see and hear you spends an action point to take an extra action and doesn't use that action to make an attack, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
These temporary hit points increase to 6 + your Wisdom modifier at 21st level.

feat.title: Remembered Mother Tongue
feat.benefit: You can read, speak, and write Supernal.
If you wish it, listeners who don't speak Supernal can understand your words as if you used their native language.

feat.title: Repel Charge
feat.benefit: When an enemy makes a charge attack against you, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as either an opportunity reaction or an immediate interrupt. If you make the attack as an immediate interrupt, you can't make one as an opportunity reaction until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Reserve Maneuver
feat.benefit: Choose an encounter attack power from your class. The power must be of your level or lower, and one that you don't already have.
When you regain the use of your powers at the end of any rest, you can choose to gain the use of the chosen power instead of regaining the use of an encounter attack power the same level or higher.
feat.special: Each time you gain a level, you can exchange the power you chose for this feat for another.

feat.title: Resilience of Death
feat.benefit: You gain immunity to disease, and gain resist 10 poison.
This resist increases to resist 15 poison at 21st level.

feat.title: Resilient Focus
feat.benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to saving throws.

feat.title: Resounding Thunder
feat.benefit: You can increase the size of any blast or burst that has the Thunder keyword.

feat.title: Resourceful Donation
feat.benefit: Whenever you spend a healing surge to regain hit points, you can divide the hit points regained between yourself and one ally adjacent to you in any proportion.

feat.title: Resurgent Attack
feat.benefit: When you spend a healing surge, you gain a +2 power bonus to the first attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Retreat Technique
feat.benefit: Whenever you hit an enemy with a melee attack during your turn, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that enemy when you move away from it. This lasts until the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Retribution Seeker
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with powers from your leader class against enemies adjacent to bloodied allies.

feat.title: Retributive Action
feat.benefit: When you use your enforce challenge class power and hit with the melee basic attack it grants, you can expend your action point to deal an additional +2[W] damage.

feat.title: Retributive Spirit
feat.benefit: When your spirit companion is destroyed, the creature that destroyed it takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of the acting creature's next turn.

feat.title: Returning Resilience
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you regain the use of your elan resilience bloodline power.

feat.title: Revelation of the Spirit
feat.benefit: Enemies hit by your Spirit attacks cannot benefit from cover or concealment (though they can benefit from superior cover or total concealment) until the the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Revenant's Challenge
feat.benefit: Whenever the target of your divine challenge class power triggers your divine saction, it gains vulnerable 5 necrotic until the start of its next turn.

feat.title: Rising Hopes
feat.benefit: When you target a dying ally with your ardent surge class power, the target can stand up and shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Rogue Weapon Mastery
feat.benefit: When you wield a weapon that benefits from your Scoundrel Weapon Talent class feature and have proficiency with that weapon, the weapon gains the High Crit weapon property.
Also, if you have combat advantage when you score a critical hit, you deal +2 additional critical damage.
The additional critical damage increases to +3 at 21st level.

feat.title: Roll with It
feat.benefit: When you are pushed, pulled, or slid, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.

feat.title: Roundabout Charge
feat.benefit: When you charge, each square of your movement need not bring you closer to the target of your charge, but you must start the charge at least 3 squares away from the target.

feat.title: Ruin of Flesh
feat.benefit: When you use your gaze of ruin racial power on an object being worn or wielded by a creature, that creature gains vulnerable to all damage until the end of your next turn. The vulnerable equals one-half your Intelligence modifier. This vulnerable immediately ends if the creature is no longer wearing or wielding the target object.

feat.title: Rune of Escape
feat.benefit: Whenever an ally within 5 squares of you uses his or her second wind, that ally can use a free reaction to shift a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half the number of Rune feats you have.

feat.title: Rune of Torment
feat.benefit: Whenever an enemy within 5 squares of you fails a saving throw against an effect caused by your runepriest power, that enemy takes damage equal to 5 + the number of Rune feats you have.

feat.title: Running Shot
feat.benefit: You don't take any attack penalty to ranged attacks for running.

feat.title: Savage Bite
feat.benefit: You can use your blood drain bloodline power against a target granting you combat advantage without having that target grabbed.

feat.title: Savage Rampage
feat.benefit: Once per round when you are raging and score a critical hit with a Barbarian attack power, you can make a melee basic attack as a free reaction.
If you are wielding more than one weapon, you must make the melee basic attack with the same weapon you scored the critical hit with.

feat.title: Shared Fortune
feat.benefit: You can use your divine fortune Channel Divinity power as a close burst 1 instead of personal power. If you do, the power targets you and each ally in the burst.

feat.title: Shield Specialization
feat.benefit: When using a shield you have proficiency with, you gain a +1 feat bonus to AC and Reflex. This counts as part of the bonus the shield grants you for abilities that reference it, such as the Encouraging Shield feat.

feat.title: Swift Spirit
feat.benefit: You can use your call spirit companion class power as a free action during your turn.

feat.title: Thundering Breath
feat.benefit: When you you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose for it to deal lightning and thunder damage and have the Lightning and Thunder keywords.
When you do, you can push each target you hit a number of squares equal to your Constitution.

feat.title: Toxic Breath
feat.benefit: Choose one creature hit by your poison damage-dealing dragon breath racial power. That creature is weakened (save ends).

feat.title: Warforged Tactics
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 bonus to melee attack rolls against an enemy that is adjacent to an ally.

feat.title: Wood Elf Kin
feat.benefit: When you use your fey step racial power, you can use a free interrupt to reroll one attack roll for the first attack you make before the end of your current turn.

feat.title: Wrath of Defeat
feat.benefit: When you drop to 0 hit points or fewer, you can use an immediate interrupt to make a melee basic attack with a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
If your hit points dropped due to a creature's attack and you target that creature with this attack, you also gain a +2 bonus to the damage rolls.
This bonus to damage increases to +5 at 21st level.

feat.title: Wrathful Conviction
feat.benefit: The bonus to damage granted by your divine strength channel divinity power increases by +2.
This increase becomes +4 at 21st level.

feat.title: Wrathful Hunter
feat.benefit: If you use your infernal wrath racial power against your quarry, you gain a +3 power bonus to attack rolls against the target for the first attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Wrathful Outburst
feat.benefit: When you use your armor of wrath Channel Divinity power, you can target any one additional enemy in the burst.

feat.title: Wrathful Panoply
feat.benefit: When you use your armor of wrath Channel Divinity power, you gain a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

feat.title: Wrathful Resurgence
feat.benefit: When you use your second wind, you also gain temporary hit points equal to one-half your healing surge value.

feat.title: Zuoken's Centering
feat.benefit: Your hit points and number of healing surges are based on your Wisdom instead of your Constitution.
Also, when you make a Strength check, you can use Wisdom instead.
In addition, your Athletics checks are based on Wisdom instead of Strength.
